subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: Enhanced capability of the Ministry of Interior, Ministry of Defence and other relevant entities to control licit and illicit arms weapons destruction and stockpile management. Enhanced institutional capacity of Ministry of Interior to promote community security, crime prevention and victims support. Development and harmonization of cooperation in disaster risk management.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: SMALL ARMS AND LIGHT WEAPONS
